body_content.explanation: If money, a house, a title, etc. is inheritable, you can give it to someone to use after you have died:
examples: She left all of her inheritable property to her granddaughter.
The court decided that the estate was not inheritable according to French law.
The title of Princess of Wales is not inheritable.

body_content.explanation: If a physical or mental characteristic that you have is inheritable, your children or grandchildren can be born with it as well:
examples: Eye colour is considered to be an inheritable characteristic.
Both of her children were born with an inheritable blood disorder.
